Title: Creates procedures for motor vehicle airbag safety; repealer
Summary: Imposes a comprehensive statutory scheme to combat airbag system fraud and protect unsuspecting consumers in NY.
LawCode: Rpld §398-d sub 6 ¶(e), amd §415-c, add §415-d, V & T L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the vehicle and traffic law, in relation to airbag safety; and to repeal paragraph (e) of subdivision 6 of section 398-d of such law relating to the replacement of inflatable restraint systems
